DESCRIPTION: The damage of Gun cards is affected by Dexterity rather than Strength.
Cybernetic cards can be implanted as permanent relics at #yRest #ySites for a credit cost equal to their energy cost. They cannot be upgraded.
Cybernetic relics can be unimplanted at #yRest #ySites to gain their respective card.
Card mods grant additional effects when played. Cards can have a maximum of #b2 mods.
#yCard #yMod: Nulling cards grant #b1 #yArtifact and #yExhaust when played.
#yCard #yMod: Beamsplitter cards target ALL enemies when played.
#yCard #yMod: Flexiweaved cards grant #b1 temporary #yDexterity when played.
#yCard #yMod: Sharp cards deal #b3 additional damage when played.
#yCard #yMod: Springloaded cards draw #b1 card and discard #b1 random card when played.
Injector cards have a #b1 #bin #b3 chance to have an additional negative effect when played.
Pulsed creatures have their next buff negated.
Lovesick creatures have their attacks and debuffs target a random enemy instead of the player.
Tinker doubles the effects of #yCard #yMods. Tinker reduces by #b1 whenever you play a #yModified card.
#yCard #yMod: Broken injector cards have double the chance to trigger an #yAdverse #yReaction.
While Blind, you cannot see enemy intents.
While Entangled, you cannot play #yAttacks this turn.
Upon receiving attack damage, gain #yBlock equal to your Malleable. #yBlock gain increases by #b1 each time Malleable is triggered. Resets to its original value at the start of your turn.
